snippet.title: Crimson Waves on the Emerald Sea: Amaranthine Moon - Official Trailer | Ghouls 4 Games
snippet.description:
In an alternate Victorian world, vampires are a part of every day life. But when an actual cure to vampirism is discovered, not everyone takes too kindly to a disturbance in the status quo. Meet the characters and learn about the world of Crimson Waves on the Emerald Sea: Amaranthine Moon in this trailer for the Victorian-era mystery otome game. Crimson Waves on the Emerald Sea: Amaranthine Moon will be available on PC.


Crimson Waves on the Emerald Sea: Amaranthine Moon follows the story of a young woman plunging headfirst into the conniving world of business dealings to get a cure for vampirism to hit the market, only to find herself in the middle of a mystery as her business partner winds up dead. Will she find out the truth, stay a vampire, and possibly find love?
